attributes.text:
Refined natural clay catalyst and adsorbent. The natural clay structure provides Lewis and Brönsted acid sites that together with a moderate surface area make.
FULCAT-200 suitable for acid catalysed reactions where high levels of acidity are disadvantageous. It is particularly suitable for the dimerisation of tall oil fatty acids.
attributes.desc: Refined natural clay catalyst and adsorbent: FULCAT-200
attributes.title: Natural clay catalyst and adsorbent: FULCAT-200

attributes.text:
High performance acid clay catalyst and adsorbent produced by combining refined natural clay and acid activation technology.
Acid activation of the natural clay structure develops enhanced Lewis and Brönsted acid sites that together with a high surface area deliver a catalyst suitable for a wide range of acid catalysed reactions.
Unique processing technology makes FULCAT-22 B particularly suitable in more demanding catalytic applications. The high surface area also delivers a product with excellent adsorption properties.
attributes.desc: High performance acid clay catalyst and adsorbent: FULCAT-22 B
attributes.title: Acid clay catalyst and adsorbent: FULCAT-22 B

attributes.text:
High performance acid clay catalyst and adsorbent produced by combining refined natural clay and acid activation technology.
Acid activation of the natural clay structure develops enhanced Lewis and Brönsted acid sites that together with a high surface area deliver a catalyst suitable for a wide range of acid catalysed reactions.
The high surface area also delivers a product with excellent adsorption properties.
attributes.desc: High performance acid clay catalyst and adsorbent: FULCAT-220
attributes.title: Acid clay catalyst and adsorbent: FULCAT-220

attributes.text:
High performance acid clay catalyst and adsorbent produced by combining refined natural clay and acid activation technology.
Acid activation of the natural clay structure develops enhanced Lewis and Brönsted acid sites that together with a high surface area deliver a catalyst suitable for a wide range of acid catalysed reactions.
The low iron content of FULCAT-435 provides improved specificity in some reactions, whilst the high surface area also delivers a product with excellent adsorption properties.
attributes.desc: High performance acid clay catalyst and adsorbent: FULCAT-435
attributes.title: Acid clay catalyst and adsorbent: FULCAT-435
